title: Computer Problems
alt: This is how I explain computer problems to my cat. My cat usually seems happier than me.
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan are looking at his computer, on the desk.]
Cueball: You know this metal rectangle full of little lights?
Megan: Yeah.Cueball: I spend most of my life pressing buttons to make the pattern of lights change however I want.
Megan: Sounds good.Cueball: But today, the pattern of lights is all wrong!
Megan: Oh god! Try pressing more buttons!
Cueball: IT'S NOT HELPING!
